title: Initialize 2D List | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will write a function to initialize a 2D list in Python with a specified width, height, and optional default value.

meta.title: Python 2D List | Data Structures | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to initialize 2D lists in Python, a powerful data structure for representing grids, tables, and matrices. Explore examples and get started with your programming journey.
meta.keywords: Python, 2D List, Data Structures, Programming Tutorials, Initialization, Grid, Matrix

verify.name: Verify 2D List Initialization
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 初始化二维列表 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将编写一个函数，用于在Python中使用指定的宽度、高度和可选的默认值来初始化二维列表。

meta.title: Python二维列表 | 数据结构 | 编程教程
meta.description: 学习如何在Python中初始化二维列表，这是一种用于表示网格、表格和矩阵的强大数据结构。探索示例并开启你的编程之旅。
meta.keywords: Python, 二维列表, 数据结构, 编程教程, 初始化, 网格, 矩阵
